faq.q1: How does Dinver help with restaurant selection?
faq.a1: Dinver enables simple restaurant searches using advanced filters, displaying up-to-date menus with prices and user reviews.
faq.a2: Yes, the app is completely free for users who are searching for restaurants and browsing menus.
faq.q3: How can restaurants add or update their information?
faq.a3: Restaurants can create an account on Dinver and update their information through the admin interface, where they can add menus, prices, images, and special offers.
faq.a4: If a restaurant supports reservations, users can select a time and number of people through Dinver and instantly book a table without calling.
faq.q5: How does the points and rewards system work?
faq.a5: Users earn points by reviewing restaurants and adding photos. These points can be redeemed for discounts and rewards at partner restaurants.
